title: (43830) Torredembarra - 27 Carretera de la Riera
description: Free and large public parking, right in front of the cemetery. No services. You sleep well, although both first thing in the morning and at night, you can hear the cars circulating. Lit up all night.

title: (43830) Torredembarra - 2 Carretera de la Riera
description: Parking Area ' La torre' in Torredembarra.

title: (43830) Torredembarra - Avinguda Pompeu Fabra 4
description: Self-service laundry washing machines 10kg

title: (43830) Torredembarra - 4 Avinguda del President Companys
description: Public parking we spent a very quiet night, the truth is, no service

name: Camping plage de Miramar
title: (43830) Camping plage de Miramar
description: Camping Miramar Beach. Very quiet and shady camping, near the town of Torredembarra, 3 minutes walk from the Renfe station, several supermarkets nearby. Beautiful beach 1 minute walk, with many restaurants on the seafront. Pizzería buenísima right next door (Il godfather of Enzo)

title: (43830) Torredembarra - 23 Passeig de Rafael Campalans
description: Road in the immediate vicinity of the beach. Not nice but in the vicinity of public toilets, drinking water fountain and supermarket.

title: (43830) Torredembarra - 1 Avinguda de Montserrat
description: Parking area, bumpy, but it can be leveled well, close to the track, but few night trains. Small super with fresh bread and sandwich and vermuteria next door.

title: (43830) Torredembarra - Carrer del Ferrocarril
description: Large and well-used parking lot near the beach. There are always some mobile homes there. The beach can be reached via a long wooden bridge. At the end of the parking lot is a busy railway line. Due to the concrete wall it is not that loud. Shops and restaurants nearby.

name: Camping Relaxsol
title: (43830) Camping Relaxsol
description:
Camping Relax Sol
Small Camping, friendly reception, you can choose your place, but close to railway (not suffer from), private passage to the beach. Sanitary outdated but clean, shower lukewarm / hot water, see when you take a shower.
Close to village, shops, bus stop and train station.

title: (43830) Torredembarra - 1 Carrer del Ferrocarril
description: Mega space. Free of charge outside of the session and nobody is itchy to stand here. Own access to the beach. Trains and cars are hardly noticeable.

name: Camping Clara
title: (43830) Camping Clara
description: Camping Clara with direct Access to the Beach. Very clean and very new! Everything you need. Little supermarket, bread and croissants in the morning. Warm showers without extra costs. You can also wash your laundry (extra costs). Train passes nearby but it’s very calm and silent.

title: (43893) Tarragona - 15B Carrer dels Munts
description: Beautiful location, magnificent view, a little passing but quiet at night

title: (43893) Altafulla - 4 Carrer Villa Romana
description: Parking to spend a night with views of Altafulla and Torredembarra beach. Lots of space for all kinds of camper vehicles. During the weekend, there may be some people in a square, but they leave immediately and you can spend the night super quiet.

name: Camping La Noria
title: (43830) Camping La Noria
description: Campsite La Noria. The employees are very friendly. Next to the beach with an underpass to save the railway line. Very clean toilets and services such as restaurant, laundry and supermarket. Accept camping ACSI card.

title: (43830) Torredembarra - 34Bis Avinguda del Canyadell
description: Parking near Altafulla beach and Torredembarra lighthouse. We spent a rather quiet night there despite a few rodeos in the evening No prohibition. Beware of the high access under the railway, we made a detour to go over the bridge.

name: Camping Don Quijote
title: (43893) Camping Don Quijote
description: Friendly family campsite with access to the beach 300 m away. A nice place to visit. A railway line passes behind the campsite, but it also makes it possible to go to Barcelona.

name: Camping Santa Eulàlia
title: (43893) Camping Santa Eulàlia
description: Great campsite with all comforts. Attention, different opening times on weekends! The reception is open daily from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. With a privileged location close to destinations of high tourist interest such as Imperial Tarraco, PortAventura, Barcelona, etc., all very well connected by highways.

title: (43893) Altafulla - 10 Carrer dels Munts
description: Perfect place to spend a quiet night, the area is a bit steep, but perfect for a night.

title: (43893) Altafulla - 6I Ronda de la Creueta
description: Quiet parking, school area, there is a park next door and a fountain. quiet area to spend the night away from the bustle of the beach

title: () Altafulla -
description:
At the edge of a road not very busy with plenty of room.
/!\ chaotic path because rocks are on the way
you have to access it by "El camí d'altafulla à la nou" because coming directly from the highway the path is much more chaotic and impassable without 4x4

title: (43893) Altafulla - 12 Passatge de la Barceloneta
description: Parking lot

title: (43893) Altafulla - 35B Carrer Cami de l'Ermita
description: Hermitage of Sant Antoni in Altafulla, with tables for picnic and fountain. 15 minutes from the city, with a very old town and castle and near the beach. On December 29, we spent the night without company. In the afternoon and in the morning, there are dog walkers.

title: (43893) Altafulla - 3 Carrer de les Sínies
description: It is an esplanade of fairly flat land. We stayed a couple of days without any problem, the very cordial police passed by and reminded us that we could not camp but we could park and spend the night.

title: (43893) Altafulla - 91 TV-2023
description: Small parking lot for 3-4 motorhomes, close to the beach and excursions to the Gaya River.

title: (43008) Tarragona - 95 Extrarradio Reste Poligon
description: El Buffet, traditional Spanish cuisine, all you can eat, hot and cold buffet, soup, dessert counter. Free showers

title: (43008) Tarragona - 343 Extrarradio Reste Poligon
description: Repsol petrol station. Free water, laundry machine. Open from 6h to 22h every day.

title: (43893) Altafulla - 14 Carrer del Migdia
description: Laundry machines at the end of the Caprabo supermarket car park

name: Camping Capfun L'Alba
title: (43839) Camping Capfun L'Alba
description: Camping near the beach. Be careful ... Very low trees. It is very difficult to fit the motorhome over 2.50 high.

name: Camping Creixell
title: (43839) Camping Creixell
description: Creixell, 3 Carrer Via Augusta. Land with trees, good services, 2 minutes from the beach, very pleasant staff, surveillance, bar, supermarket, various activities, children's park ... family atmosphere

title: (43762) La Riera de Gaià - 3 Carrer Fondo
title_short: (43762) La Riera de Gaià - 3 Carrer Fondo
description: Nice parking area in a small town with a couple of restaurants. We stayed here for a quiet night.

name: Tamarit Beach Resort
title: (43008) Tamarit Beach Resort
description: Tamarit Beach Resort. Clean campsite by the sea with private access.

name: Camping Trillas Platja Tamarit
title: (43008) Camping Trillas Platja Tamarit
description:
Campsite Trillas Platja Tamarit
more than 100 motorhome and tent pitches
large pitches
restaurant
Very nice home
bungalows

name: Camping Caledonia
title: (43007) Camping Caledonia
description: Camping calédonia accessible to motorhomes. Great grassy site and dishes. Camping all services, emptying area and filling. Very welcome in French and the cheapest in the area this season. Access to the beautiful tamarit beach by a path in the woods, 15 minutes walk. Pool and large playground. Opportunity to visit the village Atlafulla by the same path. Only downside, the proximity of the railway as on all this coast. We recommend.

title: (43763) La Nou de Gaià - 7 T-202
description: Great parking space at the entrance to the village next to the road. Mainly flat and level. Also suitable for larger mobile homes. Little traffic, but you can hear the nearby railway line, where the express trains pass.

title: (43008) Tarragona - 10 Passeig Esquirol
description: Carrer tranquil amb espais plans, with the ability to park and spend the night and swim at the Cala Jovera beach in 5 minutes, just off the coast of Castell de Tamarit.

title: (43008) Tarragona - 27 Passatge Limonium
description: Close to tennis

name: Camping Sirena Dorada
title: (43839) Camping Sirena Dorada
description: Camping sirena dorada de creixell, a perfect campsite to come with the little ones

title: (43839) Port Romà - 87 Avinguda del Mar
description: Parking by the sea in Platja de Creixell. Parking for C.C. prohibited at night. Good for a lunch stop.

title: (43839) Creixell - 57 Carrer del Mercat
description: Self-service laundry. Hours until 8:30 p.m.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 460 Autovia del Mediterrani
description: Service station with free filling and draining water. It also has a picnic area with tables. Hot shower.

title: (43007) Tarragona - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Possibility to empty gray and black water and fill drinking water. Also possibility to shower (men and women separated). Ask for it at the restaurant cashier. We had a great shower!

title: (43008) Tarragona - 49-51 Carrer Baix Empordà
description: There is no height barrier, there is no prohibition for motorhomes and others. The parking lot is not full in early summer. The squares measure between 4 and 4.5 m long. The beach is a 2-minute walk away with operational central showers. Small soccer field, basketball court and ping-pong table.

title: (43008) Tarragona - 80 Avinguda Mediterrani
description: Parking facing the sea near restaurant

title: (43008) Tarragona - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at the beach. It's free and quiet. Lots of people in high season. It has a bakery and several bazaars nearby. Also several bars nearby. The beach has showers.

name: Area 340
title: (43839) Area 340
description: Private, quiet area, with 2 shaded areas and one sunny area on the beach. All pitches with electricity. Bar / cafeteria service. Open all year long.

name: Camping Torre de la Móra
title: (43008) Camping Torre de la Móra
description: Torre de la Mora, a beautiful, well-kept campsite.  Great laid out spa and games area opposite the reception. Small playgrounds for smaller children also on the square itself. Pitches with a view of the beach in the first row. Partly quite winding, it was ok with our van 6m.

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 9 Passeig Marítim
description: Super parking for vans by the beach, restaurant bar refreshment bar

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 28 Carrer Moncayo
description:
Parking near the sea and free
no service but close to the CC area where you can go 1 night for services

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 4 Carrer Comerç
description: Picnic tables and benches.

name: Stel Camping & Bungalows Resort
title: (43883) Stel Camping & Bungalows Resort
description: Camping Stel A family campsite by the sea. Very clean toilets with all services. Very friendly staff. We only spent one night calling half an hour before arriving, being a bit late (9pm) they treated us very well. Recommendable.

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 1 Carrer de la Font
title_short: (43883) Roda de Berà - 1 Carrer de la Font
description: Cinder parking next to the school

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 7 Carrer Tarragonès
description: Huge esplanade attached to the center of the city, the most commercial area of the town. The Police pass many times during the night. Containers next door, soccer field, good coverage. During the day it is filled with cars of people who go to the center, at night you are practically alone. Highly lit areas. We rested great, very calm. It's not a big deal but in the center and safe.

name: Camping Arc de Bará
title: (43883) Camping Arc de Bará
description: Camping Arc de Bara, friendly welcome, very clean sanitary, located 100 m from the sea.

title: (43008) Tarragona - 80 Extrarradio Reste Poligon
description: It is a dirt track in the middle of the forest, there is space to leave a van or motorhome on one side of the lane and not obstruct the passage. Very little trafficked area, very quiet. The only but is that it is located between the 2 highways and you can hear the traffic in the background, but there are about 100 meters of forest and they muffle the sound quite a bit. The dirt track is passable by low vehicles.

title: (43764) - 687B Lloc Moli d'en Fortuny
description: Quiet place for a night close to the road along the stadium for the cars we can't hear them Vehicles not too big or long

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 6 Camí Barà
description: Parking by the beach and SNCF track. Very good for the day at night you can hear the trains. can help out if the Arc de la Barca campsite is full. Access to the campsite restaurant is nearby.

name: Barà Park
title: (43883) Barà Park
description: Barà Park holiday camp. you will find everything from swimming pools, tennis courts, children's parks to the supermarket, laundromat etc. it is a real small village in itself which is very pleasant.

title: (43763) Vespella de Gaià - TV-2021
description: A small, flattish roadside parking area up a hill, beneath a ruined castle and close to a few houses. It is also used as the stop for the school bus. Fabulous views down the valley towards the sea. The road is very quiet.

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 3 Avinguda Bonastre
description: Quiet place and relatively close to the beach. 900m. The area is wide and fairly flat. No camping behavior or overnight stays. Stick to the rules

title: (43764) El Catllar -
description: Large car park in small gravel. Very large. No prohibition for motorhomes. Nor to spend the night there. At school time, a few cars arrive to drop off the children and leave. It is therefore better to be at the back of the parking. Fairly quiet at night and surrounded by greenery. The free area of the village being saturated we came here, and we did well!

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 2 Carrer de Joan XXIII
title_short: (43883) Roda de Berà - 2 Carrer de Joan XXIII
description: Free Prking with showers at 50m on the beach

name: Las Palmeras Camping & Bungalow Hotel
title: (43007) Las Palmeras Camping & Bungalow Hotel
description: campsite on the beach

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 7 Avinguda Bonastre
description: Parking without services and without restrictions. Fairly level and quiet. In the park that is next door there is a water fountain next to the children's games.

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 4 Avinguda Bonastre
description: Parking we were only one day. perfect.

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 9 Carrer Hispano Suiza
title_short: (43883) Roda de Berà - 9 Carrer Hispano Suiza
description: Lidl overnight parking near Arc de Bara.

title: (43764) La Cativera -
description:
Quiet place surrounded by isolated nature next to a dam.
you can hear a little the trains and the road in the distance but nothing really bothersome. access by a passable dirt road for a van or a small motorhome.
Please leave this place clean.

name: Camping Las Palmeras Store
title: (43007) Camping Las Palmeras Store
description: Tarragona, 241 Carrer Via Augusta. The campsite Las Palmeras de Tarragona is located in a beautiful place on the coast of Costa Dorada, land surrounded by nature, nestled between palm trees and pines.

title: (43884) Bonastre - Unnamed Road
description:
Now this is what I call remote.. Just mountains and zizikies around in the woods.. Awesome if you want to run away from civilisation :) 
Great hiking tract beside. Could accommodate up to 6 camper vans but not too wide vehicles as road is rough to get here.

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 36 Carrer de la Sinia
title_short: (43883) Roda de Berà - 36 Carrer de la Sinia
description: Public parking near the beach, shaded area.

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 9 Avinguda de Catalunya
title_short: (43883) Roda de Berà - 9 Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Parking in the center of the urban area. Very very quiet. With trees and 5 minutes from the beach.

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 33 Carrer Hispano Suiza
title_short: (43883) Roda de Berà - 33 Carrer Hispano Suiza
description: Repsol gas station with self-service washer and dryer. Free water and air.

name: Camping Las Salinas
title: (43007) Camping Las Salinas
description:
Camping Las Salinas
Directly on the beach. Nice spot with good restaurant. Bathrooms don't have toilet paper and toilet seats. Nice owners. Even though next to train line it is very quiet.
Price is good and supermarket at camping Las Palmas.

title: (43884) Bonastre - 43 Carrer Muralla
description: Esplanade of terra ben leveled prop of the road i of the collegi del poble. Aprop d'un restaurant

title: (43884) La Vinya de Bonastre - Unnamed Road
title_short: (43884) La Vinya de Bonastre - Unnamed Road
description: Nice little place to spend a night, view of the sea and the city, we were 2 DEFENDERS and had a great night.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 6 Carreró A
description: Free water Repsol station

name: Camping Francàs
title: (43880) Camping Francàs
description: Very nice place. Friendly people in beautiful surroundings. Many permanent campers. The sanitary facilities are very clean.

title: (43884) Bonastre -
description: Large concrete slab across from the graveyard. No signs prohibiting camping. Probably the best spot in the area. Water fountain in the town nearby

title: (43884) Bonastre - Carrer del Sagrat
description: It‘s not easy to find accessible parking for a big vehicle in this park. We found this clean spot on the side of a very quiet but paved side road, surrounded by nature, hiking/jogging trails, and mysterious caves. We loved it. It was also easy to rotate the caravan on the spot when leaving. Be aware, one caravan takes up almost the entire room available, maybe another van would fit, but no more.

title: (43700) Francàs - Cami de les Pedreres
description: Nice and quiet place for a night. No height limit although trees at entrance are probably about 3/4 metres. Didn’t see any prohibition signs. Dixie available.

title: (43885) Salomó - Carrerada de Valls al Vendrell
title_short: (43885) Salomó - Carrerada de Valls al Vendrell
description: Place surrounded by nature, no service, very quiet. Some tractors and cyclists during the day. Slightly sloping terrain. Attention, difficult access from Salomo, because very narrow streets. I do not recommend for motorhomes.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 2B Carretera Platja Llarga
description: Beautiful cove away from the crowd. Shady parking on the creek. Only downside, the train passes right next but the place is so magical that we forget the train. Picnic tables under the pines close to the beach with bins provided, but not very clean. Showers on the beach. Pedestrian walk on the sea front. Ideal for families or couples

title: (43764) El Catllar - 17 Carrer de Prades
description: It is recommended to reserve in advance the number available for park4night  subscribers. Small private property (no Service Area) with an access road not recommended for motorhomes longer than 7 meters. Family atmosphere so no more than 3 vans per night allowed. Caravans are also not allowed. 4 km from the world heritage city of Tarragona. Public transport to the city very close. Nearby veterinary hospital. Beaches at 4 km. Supermarkets 2 km. Ideal for motorhomes and equipped vans, ideal parking to visit the city in the heart of nature. (no toilet, box in the vehicle, no shower) electricity and water included.

title: (43884) Bonastre - Carrer del Sagrat
description: Small corner surrounded by nature in the mountains, 15 minutes from the beach. Possibility of putting two vans See more? perfect for a quiet night and a beautiful sunrise. On the other hand, there is no shadow.

title: (43884) Bonastre - Carrer del Sagrat
description:
Little sidestop on a gravy road before a dead end (not for a vey big vehicle). Right under a big electric pole so easy to find, makes some noise of electricity passing in the cables but we got used to it after 10 minutes, really no big deal.
Beautiful mountains view around and sky full of stars good visible as not much light pollution in the area :)

title: (43007) Tarragona - 9 Camí Nou Budallera
description: Quiet road to spend the night and enjoy one of the lungs of the city of Tarragona. Wc: the forest! 10 min from the center of the city and close to beaches

title: (43700) El Vendrell - 20 Carrer del Consolat de Mar
title_short: (43700) El Vendrell - 20 Carrer del Consolat de Mar
description: Chinese hypermarket parking. Quiet area near chalets. Ideal for one night. Level area, no shims are needed. Gas station 1 minute walk!

title: (43880) El Vendrell - 12 Carrer de Jaume Huguet
title_short: (43880) El Vendrell - 12 Carrer de Jaume Huguet
description: Lidl car park, with 3 spaces for acv, cv and camper

title: (43880) Coma-ruga - 61 Passeig Marítim de Coma-ruga
description: Parking along the road, facing the sea. Very quiet, little traffic, nice walk along the paseo, bars and restaurants nearby. We spent a quiet night.

title: (43884) Bonastre -
description: Small corner above the road sheltered from view, very easy to access, next to an electric pilone, flat. At the entry of a private property, be careful not to obstruct the entrance. We spent the night there without problem, the road can be busy, very quiet. And don't forget, nature welcomes us so let's respect it. Pick up your waste.

title: (43880) Coma-ruga - 8 Carrer Monestir de Santes Creus
title_short: (43880) Coma-ruga - 8 Carrer Monestir de Santes Creus
description: Drinking water tap at a playground. Open during covid

title: (43880) Coma-ruga - 44 Passeig Marítim de Coma-ruga
description: stand by the sea

title: (43007) Tarragona - s/n Carrer Pairal
description: Large parking lot next to the Loreto picnic area. Not very clean but close to town and good choice. walk in the forest around the car park barbecue area, and water tap (not drinkable)

title: (43007) Tarragona - 13A Camí Budallera
description: Parking, unguarded esplanade. Free. 5 min from the beach on foot. Water point in a small park nearby

title: (43007) Tarragona - 6 Cami B
description: Stadium parking

title: (43880) Coma-ruga - 8 Carrer Gavina
description: Quite large and quiet parking lot to visit the town with some shadows

title: (43880) Coma-ruga - 1 Carrer del Montsant
description: Ok for small Van's only just waste ground not very big but free

title: (43880) Coma-ruga - 22 Plaça Sector 3
description: Large car park without services next to the School and 5 minutes from the beach. ideal for weekends and parties (since there is no school activity) nearby you can do walking routes and there is a karting and a pintball nearby. also playground for the little ones. access 1 minute from the N-340. supermarkets, gas stations and services 2 minutes away, even on foot.

title: (43151) Els Pallaresos - 17 Carrer de la Cerdanya
title_short: (43151) Els Pallaresos - 17 Carrer de la Cerdanya
description: Multiple battery parking spaces in urbanized areas, normally empty.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 16 Carrer Ernest Lluch
description: Parking all along Carrer Ernest Lluch street. bike path and pedestrian. 15 minutes from the Roman amphitheater. great mercadonia next door. perfect for visiting the Roman city. free without service. beach at 10 minutes.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 16 Carrer Ernest Lluch
description: Supermarket parking lot

title: (43007) Tarragona - 32 Camí de l'Ermita de Loreto
title_short: (43007) Tarragona - 32 Camí de l'Ermita de Loreto
description: Ermita de la salud, accesible, with drinking water, noisy because highway nearby

title: (43151) Els Pallaresos - 14 Carrer Pallars Sobirà
description: There is no place to stop eating, even sleeping. We alone have lunch and it is very quiet. In the middle of some houses in the urbanization.

title: (43765) La Secuita - 9 Carretera Valls-tarragona
description: Picnic area.

title: (43880) Coma-ruga - 2 Carrer Doctor Fleming
description: It is a dry stream where pedestrians and some cars pass to go to the beach... it is a 1-minute walk away... In summer many motorhomes and campers are placed, the creek so to speak... It adjoins a campsite, yes you cross the road you have services and the beach of sant salvador. I live right next door and I see how they camp there without problems.

title: (43880) Sant Salvador - Passeig Marítim Joan Reventós
title_short: (43880) Sant Salvador - Passeig Marítim Joan Reventós
description: Small parking in front of Vendrell beach. Platja of San Salvador. Well for motorhome less than 7 meters. I think no problem out of season, but prohibited during the season, because parking in front of housing buildings. For camper you must use the places that are in the middle, otherwise you risk going past the locations. Of course, forbidden to go out table or seats, at the risk that the police will chase you.

name: Camping Sant Salvador
title: (43880) Camping Sant Salvador
description:
Very good campsite next to the beach
nice personal
welcoming place good seats but a bit hard to maneuver I have a 7m.
excellent equipment toilets and showers, washing machine, quoin a crockery.
restaurant inside and marquet just at the entrance with a store that makes grills.
there are miles of beach and promenade.
nice atmosphere.

title: (43716) Albinyana - Unnamed Road
description:
Small dirt parking lot next to the hermitage, super quiet to sleep. It is not recommended to take a very long motorhome or large volume as you have to cross inside the town and the streets are a bit narrow. It is in a privileged area at the top of the town of Albinyana on the mountain with little light pollution. We have seen the best Perseid rains there. From the parking lot you can see the coast and the
sunrise.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 1 Passeig de Torroja
description: Day parking right near the old town of Tarragona. About 10 minutes to the city wall. Parking fee 1 euro for the whole day.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 10 Camí del Llorito
description: Square dirt and flat, free and quiet. Not nice to see but 2 minutes from the ciutat velle. Comfortable but no shade, at night illuminated

title: (43007) Tarragona - 5B Camí Ermita Salut-I
description: Dirt parking without services and without shade, but it is completely free and there is enough space (about 60 spaces) even for larger vehicles. There are no good views, but you can spend the night and the best thing is that it is very close to the historic center of Tarragona. For one night it works perfectly.

title: (43880) Sant Salvador - 31 Ua-4
description: Good place to spend the night, quiet, flat, unpaved, close to the beach

title: (43002) Tarragona - 21 Carrer de San Auguri
description: Several taps with drinking water. Only to fill the bottles, not to connect the hose.

title: (43007) Tarragona - 8 Avinguda Puig i Valls
description:
A nice spot for a night. Probably not allowed to leave the vehicle with no one inside but proper for spending a night. Beautiful view point on Tarragona.
Warning - quite slopy. Access for medium vehicles max (~7m long or smaller) due to narrow road.
Beware of cables running above the road, probably ~3,5m height limit (see picture).

title: (43700) El Vendrell - 10 Avinguda de les Escoles
title_short: (43700) El Vendrell - 10 Avinguda de les Escoles
description: Large and quiet parking next to schools and a sports center with bathrooms.

title: (43880) Sant Salvador - 13 Passeig Marítim Joan Reventós
title_short: (43880) Sant Salvador - 13 Passeig Marítim Joan Reventós
description: Quiet parking lot on a side street by the sea.

title: (43007) Tarragona - s/n Camí Pont del Diable
title_short: (43007) Tarragona - s/n Camí Pont del Diable
description: Good quiet place to sleep, near the Devil's bridge.

title: (43700) El Vendrell - s/n Carretera de Sant Vicenç
title_short: (43700) El Vendrell - s/n Carretera de Sant Vicenç
description: Very convenient laundry service in the supermarket parking lot (very good market by the way)

title: (43002) Tarragona - Avinguda Catalunya
description: Ideal to visit the very quiet city on August 1

title: (43700) El Vendrell - 33 Avinguda del Baix Penedès
title_short: (43700) El Vendrell - 33 Avinguda del Baix Penedès
description: Cheap laundry ... parking in the back street for big vans and ac

title: (43002) Tarragona - Av. Catalunya
description: New and fast laundromat. There are only 3 washing units (9,14,19kg) and two big 17kg dryers. Washing is 30min and drying 20min with increments of 5min/1euro but it's no need if you select hot air. Payment by card or coins accepted. I paid 14 euros for wash&dry 15kg laundary, all done in 30 25min.

title: (43007) Tarragona - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Great viewpoint of Roman Aqueduct. Free parking just off the motorway to have a picnic near your vehicle and to see or visit the Roman aqueduct. Do NOT leave your vehicle unattended as many vehicles have been broken into here.

title: (43130) Tarragona - 2 Carrer del Barranc del Comellar
title_short: (43130) Tarragona - 2 Carrer del Barranc del Comellar
description: Dead end. we have slept right there because we arrived late. There is an accessible and quiet forest area very close at night if a car passes by on the road next door. The temperature is very pleasant. Quiet place to spend a single night.

title: (43700) El Vendrell - 13 Carrer de Josep Carner
title_short: (43700) El Vendrell - 13 Carrer de Josep Carner
description: Ground parking. without services, near the center

title: (43812) Montferri - T-204
description: Church of Rocamora ideal to rest the night and visit the surroundings

title: (43130) Tarragona - Carretera de Tarragona
description: Free parking to have a picnic near your vehicle and to see or visit the Roman aqueduct. Do NOT leave your vehicle unattended as many vehicles have been broken into here.

title: (43004) Tarragona - Moll de Llevant
description: Parking at the port. Small vehicles only

title: (43700) El Vendrell - 21 Carrer Isabelins
description: Descampat sense cap mena de servei. Força pla. El millor: 5 minutes from the Vendrell historic center.

name: Càmping Vendrell Platja
title: (43880) Càmping Vendrell Platja
description: Camping Vendrell platges in Calafell. Located by the sea 200 meters from the beach, swimming pool, playground, tennis, restaurant, food, sanitary modern and clean, very wooded and well maintained, easy access for large camper, disabled access

title: (43004) Tarragona - b4 Moll de Llevant
description: Facing the sea, next to the port. 12 places to park. In principle there are no prohibitions to spend the night with a van. We have asked the Port and they have not prevented us. Quiet place, although before 00:00 there is a lot of movement along the walk.

title: (43005) Tarragona - 15 Carrer de Francesc Bastos
description: Covered and guarded parking, ideal for parking with a small van (height limit 2.1m) and going to visit the city.

title: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès - 1 Carrer Emporda
title_short: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès - 1 Carrer Emporda
description: Hermitage of Santa Cristina. A very quiet place (December 31) to spend the night with good views. There is a small area with swings but it is very neglected. At the access there is a small stretch of dirt track, in good condition but narrow, it is not recommended for motorhomes or large vehicles, but in a van without problems.

title: (43005) Tarragona - 29 Carrer Josep M Terrasa
description: Parking managed by a social project. Inserted in a park with shaded parking, games for children, fountains and kiosk.

title: (43006) Tarragona - 6 Carrer del Francolí
description: 12 picnic tables

title: (43005) Tarragona - 2 Carrer de Guillem Oliver
description: Dead end street, very quiet and with police nearby. It has the ideal francoli park nearby to walk the dog and 15 minutes walk from the center of tarragona.

title: (43812) Bràfim - 6 Avinguda de Loreto
description:
Ground parking in the center of this quiet little town.
The places are not marked, but they take about 50 vehicles.
Starting point to visit one of its wineries or its various restaurants.
At night it is illuminated.
We have slept very peacefully, without any noise.

title: (43880) Calafell - 28 Avinguda Sanatori
description: Along the street there is a large and two smaller squares, slightly isolated from the city and surrounded by greenery. The train is easy to hear and beach is within a few minutes walk. I could spend a night here relaxed. Unfortunately, the place is pretty littered.

title: (43887) Nulles - 1 Passeig de l'Estació
description: Nulles quiet town Parking next to the train track (few trains pass). In front of us we have the coperativa of wine. (White wine Seduction is very good). You have a fountain and a very close children's park, in the direction of the village.

title: (43005) Tarragona - 18 Passeig de la Independència
description: Municipal parking lot convenient for parking and going to town or shopping nearby. However this car park is not for large vehicles such as motorhomes but rather for converted vans. Day parking.

title: (43005) Tarragona - 7 Prolongació Passeig Independència
description: Public fountain next to the regulated parking area. In this area, for one euro you can park all day and take advantage of it and get water

title: (43006) Tarragona - T-721
description: Paid parking per day 9am-8pm, free Saturday and Sunday. Probably fine over night as no signs prohibiting.

title: (43880) Calafell - 27 Carrer del Ferrocarril
description: Small shaded lot for night and day. Near the train track.

title: (43700) El Vendrell - 34 Carrer dels Vidriers
description: Parking for day and night, point of sale of butane and laundry. In the same street a little further up, repair service for motorhomes and campers.

title: (43154) Les Gunyoles - Camí del Molí
description: Parking in quiet village with swings and drinking fountain. Routes by bike and on foot. Many places.

title: (43120) Constantí - 1 Cami l'Almoster
description: Parking site of the Villa Romana de Centcelles located 2 km from the city. No service.

title: (43820) Calafell - 52 Passeig de la Unió
description: Market Square in Calafell

title: (43006) Tarragona - 5 Urbanització Riu Clar
description: An easily accessible fountain in a park near the highway.

title: (43820) Calafell - 1 Avinguda Vilarenc
description: Good place to spend the night next to the police, 5 minutes from the center and 5 minutes from the beach

title: (43004) Tarragona - 10 Carrer Méndez Núñez
description: Day parking

title: (43820) - 10B Carretera Estació
description: Free parking. Had a quiet night and day (out of season)

title: (43820) Calafell - 2 Carrer Aire
description: Calafell - Pueblo. Public parking

title: (43120) Constantí - 2X Carrer Major
description: A nice park to spend the day and night

title: (43820) Calafell - 41 Avinguda Mossèn Jaume Soler
description: Inexpensive "La wash", washing, drying for 20 minutes open from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: (43120) Constantí - 32 Carrer Mossèn Ramon Bergadà
description: Free parking to spend the day, I highly recommend it next to nature

title: (43760) El Morell - 299 Lloc Hospitals
description: Good place to sleep on weekends a lot of movement because it is a free barbecue area near the river

title: (43144) Vallmoll - 24 Camí dels Morts
description: Area with 2 tables and benches. Swings, slide ... under the pines. Lots of shade.

title: (43140) La Pobla de Mafumet - 8 Carrer La Coma
title_short: (43140) La Pobla de Mafumet - 8 Carrer La Coma
description: Good place to spend a night if you go the road, great esplanade and charming city, in the city there are more places to spend the night, safe place and suitable for many motorhomes or vans.

title: (43812) Puigpelat - 5 Avinguda dels Països Catalans
description: Land parking in the center of the city. There is a house next to where you can eat. At 1 min there is a pharmacy and a bread oven. There is also a fountain at the entrance to the sports center.

title: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès -
description: Highway rest area. Ideal to stop to eat with tables and shade.

title: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès - 18 Carrer Zamora
title_short: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès - 18 Carrer Zamora
description: Good place to rest, hidden and respectable.

title: (43140) La Pobla de Mafumet - 43 Carrer Mas Blanc
title_short: (43140) La Pobla de Mafumet - 43 Carrer Mas Blanc
description: Very quiet street with a huge playground for children.

title: (43812) Puigpelat - 3 Carrer dels Pins
description: Playground area typical of town, but incorporating picnic tables and benches. Maintained area, with bins, banks and a fountain.

title: (43760) El Morell - 10 Carrer Àngel Guimerà
description: Esplanada where parking is allowed at least during the holidays. Near the center. There were many cars and people partying so when you go to sleep it can be uncomfortable but it gets you out of trouble. There is no shadow

title: (43882) Calafell - 196 Passeig Marítim de Sant Joan de Déu
title_short: (43882) Calafell - 196 Passeig Marítim de Sant Joan de Déu
description: Superb calisthenics park. Wide and long boardwalk.

address.street: 196 Passeig Marítim de Sant Joan de Déu

title: (43719) Bellvei - 49 Carrer Lluís Companys
description: Quiet and ample parking, with some trees for shade. Sports area with swimming pool open during the summer months to shower, toilets ... Bakery and pharmacy at 100m, bars, medical center, supermarkets and shops.

title: (43719) Bellvei - 30 Carrer Polisportiu
description: Bellveí salon - The Plans

title: (43814) Vila-rodona - 14 Cami C
description: Great picnic area and large parking next to it. Several tables, benches, barbecues, a lot of shade.

title: (43882) Calafell - 244 Passeig Marítim de Sant Joan de Déu
title_short: (43882) Calafell - 244 Passeig Marítim de Sant Joan de Déu
description: Very quiet next to the sea and cozy, it has electricity and water. You are right next to the beach and you can see the water from the place, they have surveillance. With toilets and showers.

address.street: 244 Passeig Marítim de Sant Joan de Déu

title: (43814) Vila-rodona - 90 Carrer de la Font
description: Picnic area with 4 tables and benches, barbecues, fountain, trash can and good shade. In front of the Gaia river.

title: (43882) Calafell - 255 Passeig Marítim de Sant Joan de Déu
title_short: (43882) Calafell - 255 Passeig Marítim de Sant Joan de Déu
description: Very clean laundry. 6 euros for 19kg and 5 euros for 15kg. drying 2 euros for 20 min. Open from 7:30 a.m. to 10 p.m. Parking near the port or in the street for small vehicles.

address.street: 255 Passeig Marítim de Sant Joan de Déu

title: (43813) Alió - Unnamed Road
description: Old soccer field that can be used as a car park. In front is the village pool that opens from June 24 to early September. For a nominal fee you can use the pool which has toilets, showers and bar service.

title: (43713) Sant Jaume dels Domenys - 35 Carrer de Sant Antoni
title_short: (43713) Sant Jaume dels Domenys - 35 Carrer de Sant Antoni
description: Open 24 hours, ideal for spending the night en route. Very calm.

title: (43718) La Juncosa del Montmell - Unnamed Road
title_short: (43718) La Juncosa del Montmell - Unnamed Road
description: On the edge of a road between the vineyards there are two small tables and a drinking water tap :)

title: (43718) - 31 Avinguda Josep Tarradellas
description: Very quiet place in terms of sports facilities, at the entrance of the village. Drinking water fountain and garbage can. Beautiful view of the vines on the terrace. Very calm. Had a quiet night.

title: (43204) Tarragona - 6 Cami Bassa de les Cabres
title_short: (43204) Tarragona - 6 Cami Bassa de les Cabres
description: Small car park under trees at the edge of a gravel road. Quiet location next to the freeway, otherwise undisturbed. There is a large storage area for equipment on the street, but there is still nothing going on here.

title: (43712) Llorenç del Penedès - 18 T-240
description: Parking with  shadow by trees, with a supermarket 100 meters. And entrance and exit of motorway to 5 km.

title: (43800) Valls - 3 Muralla del Carme
description: Free municipal parking that has 7 places for motorhomes and although they are signposted the majority are occupied by cars. The municipal police does not take responsibility and does not fine the cars parked in those places.

title: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 8 Carrer de Plácido Domingo
title_short: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 8 Carrer de Plácido Domingo
description: Superb parking, empty in low season, cafes and bars nearby7

title: (43800) Valls - 11 Carrer Vapor de Maó
description: Parking with space for motorhomes

title: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 3 Carrer de Victòria dels Àngels
title_short: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 3 Carrer de Victòria dels Àngels
description: Dead-end street that ends at the foot of the beach. Very quiet in April/May (for sure it changes in the summer season). Showers on the beach, walk...

name: Camping La Pineda de Salou
title: (43481) Camping La Pineda de Salou
description: Vila-seca, 280 Carretera de la Costa. Camping La Pineda Salou. Very good campsite with swimming pool, grocery store, bar and restaurant. Electricity, water, emptying, sanitary, camping equipment. Perfect and quiet, ask for a location closer to the middle and far from the road but otherwise nothing to complain about.

title: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 47 Carrer d'Amadeu Vives
title_short: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 47 Carrer d'Amadeu Vives
description: Esplanade of land and grass 150mts from the beach where there are shops, restaurants etc. You can spend the night without problems in the middle of July. No service for Motorhomes.

title: (08732) La Gornal - 7 Carrer Quintana
description: Parking with a playground in front. No services. Quiet stop or sleep if you are en route.

title: (43800) Valls - 2 Avinguda del Fornàs
description: This is not specifically reserved for motorhomes but there is always plenty of room and large spaces. Free parking with swimming pool in front and playground if you continue down and skate park.

title: (43800) Valls - 12 Passeig President Tarradellas
description: A large parking lot, with stony surfaces, right next to the police station. Supermarket and washing machines around the corner. Downtown within easy walking distance.

title: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 30 Carrer d'Enrico Caruso
title_short: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 30 Carrer d'Enrico Caruso
description: Ample parking near the beach. No services. Close to bars, restaurants and supermarkets. We have spent a very quiet night.

title: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 7a Carrer de Marcos Redondo
title_short: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 7a Carrer de Marcos Redondo
description: Laundry, sewing, ironing,

title: (43881) Cunit - 123 Carrer de Joaquim Mir
description: Parking near the sea, the other parking was closed, it is right in front of the train, without service and 100 meters from the sea.

title: (43881) Cunit - 179 Avinguda de Barcelona
description: Laundry "La Wash" the area to park those little ones for 6-7m you can still park in the zebrado that there is and you don't bother anyone it has two small washing machines and 9kg and another large one of 19kg and two dryers 15kg and 19Kg.

title: (43718) - Unnamed Road
description: Castle parking in ruins of Montmell

title: (43718) La Juncosa del Montmell -
description: Nice little viewpoint, accessible after about 3 km of gravel road. Relatively flat place to park a van- max 2. Good starting point for walks. There are no facilities, take your rubbish with you!

title: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 49 Passeig de Pau Casals
title_short: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 49 Passeig de Pau Casals
description: Parking facing the sea. Out of season we parked, beautiful sea view;) we did not stay to sleep because I think it is prohibited

title: (43881) Cunit - 139 Passeig Marítim
description: Public toilets and outdoor showers. Open in low season too.

title: (43481) Vila-seca - 15 Carrer del Camí del Racó
title_short: (43481) Vila-seca - 15 Carrer del Camí del Racó
description: This is the Pacha car park in Salou. but the pacha car park is free...very spacious, little noise...I guess it's open all year round. I find it incredible that no one has downloaded it yet.. hahahahaha

title: (43840) Salou - 12 Carrer del Farallo
description: Parked up overnight

title: (43840) - 5E Extrarradio Crt
description: Quiet parking flat good for a break or a night if everything is complete around next to the golf for amateurs

title: (43720) L'Arboç - 13 Avinguda del Rei Pere I
title_short: (43720) L'Arboç - 13 Avinguda del Rei Pere I
description: Car park near the N340, ideal for a stopover on the road, either during the day or at night to spend the night. It has good entrances and exits, well located and close to services. Right in front there is a motorhome warehouse that has a service to empty wastewater and fill it with clean water. They also have a service for small repairs and sale of accessories and products for the toilet...etc. Right next door there is a SPART supermarket with very good service.

title: (43480) Vila-seca - 17A Carrer de Vilafortuny
description: Roadside parking in an industrial area. It is safe, you will certainly be with truckers. Be careful, you can hear a driver leaving at night and in the morning a factory just next door makes noise, it's just to help out one night and leave in the morning because the rest of the car parks are full!

title: (08729) Clariana - 35 BV-2116
description: Large area of land to park and spend the night next to the Clariana church. Right in front there are some fields and a playground. Good 4G connection.

title: (43480) Vila-seca - 603 Carrer del Castellet
description: By necessity to go to the health center we spent the night there and slept very well. Max. Length 6 to 7 m

title: (43480) Vila-seca - Via Màxima
description: Parking without height limit. Please note the ground is rather dirty and not flat, however it is near a McDonald's for toilets and to eat
